MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L24 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Hale Drive. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30PM to remove a generator and complete full repairs on a cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:45PM on 14th October 2020.
